casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

January 10, 2014

[Cite as 01/10/2014 Case Announcements, 2014-Ohio-36.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2013-0536. State v. Spaulding.

Summit C.P. No CR12051508. This cause is pending before the court as a death-penalty appeal from the Court of Common Pleas for Summit County.

Upon consideration of appellant’s motion to avoid dismissal for want of prosecution, it is hereby ordered by the court that appellant shall file his merit brief within ten days of the date of this entry. No extension of this deadline shall be permitted. It is further ordered that the motion to avoid dismissal for want of prosecution is denied as moot.
